definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

Deng Xiaoping's four modernizations practiced from the 1980s (possibly planned together with Zhou Enlai), namely: modernization of industry, agriculture, national defense and science and technology/abbr. to 四化
modernization of national defense, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
modernization of industry, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
Modern New Confucianism/see also 新儒家[Xin1 Ru2 jia1]

sentences.english: Moreover, the skull has features resembling those of contemporary Asians.
sentences.chinese: 此外，該頭骨具備類似現代亞洲人頭骨的特徵。

sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根據現代急救理念，電除顫必須與心肺復甦聯合應用。

sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生沒有忽略更能代表現代西式泰國的藏品。

sentences.english: In modern poetry, there are sound and meaning with the structure of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在現代詩詞中存在着音義同構的現象。

sentences.english: Later, those boats were heavily outrun by modern ships.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，那些船很重地根據現代船跑得更快。

sentences.english: He is one of the most talented and inventive drummers in modern music.
sentences.chinese: 他是現代音樂界最具天賦和創造力的鼓手之一。

sentences.english: Wang Guowei is the founder of China's modern aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 王國維是中國現代美學的奠基者。

sentences.english: The modern superficies systems stem from Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 近現代地上權肇端於羅馬法。

sentences.english: Pico-satellites are the import investigative domain in the modern aerospace technologies.
sentences.chinese: 皮型衛星是現代航天技術中的重要研究領域。

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 區位理論是現代經濟地理學基本理論的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Jack has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.
sentences.chinese: 傑克對所有這些現代觀念都抱有相當偏頗的看法。

sentences.english: Goose is a grass - eating poultry, and goose is a kind of modern healthy food.
sentences.chinese: 鵝是食草家禽，鵝肉屬現代健康食品。

sentences.english: I am learning modern dance in school.
Modern sculpture in Kalasa Citadel ruins.
Santanas, especially the new 2000models, have become big sellers.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔納，特別是現代2000，擁有衆多的買家。

sentences.english: This is why the modern Chinese politics becomes imitative politics.
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國現代政治成了“模仿的政治”。

definition: Republic of China (1912-1949)/used in Taiwan as the name of the calendar era (e.g. 民國六十年|民国六十年 is 1971, the 60th year after 1911)
